weekly_top_story.headline: CMS Finalizes 2026 Medicare Physician Fee Schedule with Key Adjustments Impacting Physician Payments
weekly_top_story.summary: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) released the final rule for the 2026 Medicare Physician Fee Schedule, including a -2.5% productivity adjustment and exemptions for certain healthcare services, affecting reimbursement rates for physicians.
weekly_top_story.source: Alston & Bird Health Care Week in Review

stories.headline: New York State Health Department Highlights Affordable Health Insurance Enrollment Deadline for 2025 Coverage
stories.summary: New York State urges residents to enroll by December 15 for health coverage starting January 2025, featuring expanded eligibility and reduced out-of-pocket costs through upgraded Essential and Qualified Health Plans.

stories.headline: BTIG Hosts 5th Annual Ophthalmology Day Showcasing Innovations in Eye Care Technologies and Therapeutics
stories.summary: BTIG’s virtual event gathers over 25 biomedical and biotechnology companies to discuss recent advances and future trends in ophthalmic medical devices and treatments, reflecting growing industry focus on eye health.
